alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; East Laramie County; East Platte County; Laramie Valley (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued February 18 at 8:57AM MST until February 20 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE SATURDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 50 mph with gusts up to 65 mph possible. * WHERE...East Platte County, Laramie Valley, Central Laramie County and East Laramie County. * WHEN...From Saturday afternoon through late Saturday night. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds may be hazardous to light weight and high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers, with a risk for blow overs.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; East Laramie County; East Platte County; Laramie Valley
